game.name: Occulto
game.shortDescription: Occulto is an indie adventure game with a focus on artistic hand-drawn visuals and a non verbal game play, set in a fantasy world. Guide Eliot through riddles, mysteries, puzzles, strange creatures, faraway places and help him find his master!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Occulto is an indie adventure game with a focus on artistic hand-drawn visuals and a non verbal game play, set in a fantasy world. Guide Eliot through riddles, mysteries, puzzles, strange creatures, faraway places and help him find his master!
